name: Oline Multiplayer Game
description: This is a funny multiplayer game for you to play online with your friends. How to Connect to a Friend's Match: Once you are in a match, you're gonna see a 6 digit code on the top center of the screen.   Once you received that code, press the "Join Game" button on the screen and enter the code, now you can join and have fun!! Controls: W,S | Up, Down Arrows => Move Forward/Backward D,A | Right, Left Arrows => Turn Around E => Jump SPACE => Shoot This is my first multiplayer game. It's very simple, but I hope you like it!!!
